attributes.additional_details:
Since the advent of the internet pornography has
become more widespread and accessable, such material has helped in the moral decline of our nation, Clearly this kind of material leads to moral depravity,Primary legislation is needed to prevent this material from damaging the moral wellbeing of the nation by forcing internet service providers to block the kind of material if we are to start the moral rebuilding of our nation then this would be a good start.
